name: Diet Run
description:
Diet Run is an infinite runner game where your survival depends on what you consume. Eating too much fast food or healthy food will result in your death. Moreover, a lot of stamina gain might seem better than endurance, or is it? So, what seems bad now might be good for you in the long run!

Controls:

Press A/D || Left/Right arrow || Swipe Mouse Left/Right to move left right

Future Plans:
  1. Add Power Ups 
  2.  Introduce more game mechanics and obstacles
  3.  Improved difficulty progression 
  4.  Optimize for mobile 

Assets:
Model: https://www.kenney.nl/assets, https://assetstore.unity.com
Audio: https://freesound.org
UI: Shamit Ahmed, https://www.freepik.com/
Animation: https://www.mixamo.com
